resources.string:
1. I can learn and understand better by:

 	a. Reading only text books and notes given by the teacher

 	b. Listening to teachers/friends

 	c. Watching topic related videos in YouTube / attending Exhibitions and visiting museums

 	d. Doing hands-on experiments and activities using materials

 	e. Teaching the learnings to my peers
Note: \nOrientations give the raw angle of the marker (from 0 to 359). This angle will change depending on the orientation of the device.
